title: Daisy Lowe, 30, reveals she had a 'heartbreaking' secret abortion
text:
Daisy Lowe has revealed she had a 'heartbreaking' secret abortion because she 'wasn't ready to be a mum'.

The model, 30, bravely opened up about her decision after falling pregnant in a past relationship, revealing she is 'grateful' she was given a choice.

Daisy said: 'I wasn't ready to be a mum. It was heartbreaking. But I'm so grateful I didn't have that baby.

Speaking out: Daisy Lowe has spoken about her secret abortion for the first time, revealing she's 'grateful' she was given a choice because she 'wasn't ready to be a mum'

'I would have sacrificed a lot and I wouldn’t have been the best mum at the time.'

Daisy made the admission while being interviewed by Mel B on her new dating podcast The Truth Flirts with Badoo.

The Spice Girls star asked her whether she would ever date someone who had conflicting views on abortion.

'The only time when it has come up in my relationship was when I did get pregnant and I did need to make the choice and I chose to have one', Daisy explained.

'He was supportive, but I had to go to the clinic and it was heartbreaking.

She said: 'I would have sacrificed a lot and I wouldn’t have been the best mum at the time'

'He called me when I was having the scan and there was a healthy heartbeat, he said, "You’ve got to keep it, we’ve got to keep it".

'I was like, "Are you f**king kidding me?" I was like "I can’t".'

Daisy went on to explain why it's 'every woman's choice' to have an abortion, adding that there's enough children who are in need of love in the world.

She said: 'Ultimately there are a lot of very unwanted, unwell kids in the world who need a whole lot of love.

'The planet is overpopulated enough, so why should we bring unwanted kids into the world.

New romance: Daisy has been inseparable from singer Jack Penate since they were spotted enjoying a romantic walk in a London park a few weeks ago

'I think it’s important. It’s a heartbreaking decision to make. “I’m really grateful that I had the choice growing up.'

Daisy has been inseparable from singer Jack Penate, 35, since they were spotted enjoying a romantic walk in a London park a few weeks ago.

Earlier this autumn, she split from her model ex Cameron McMeikan over their six-year age difference.

She previously dated The Crown's Matt Smith, Hurts singer Theo Hutchcraft and Peaches Gedolf's widower Thomas Cohen, as well as artist John Leigh.
